Package com.brunom

Class SportMode

java.lang.Object
com.brunom.DriveMode
com.brunom.SportMode
public class SportMode
extends DriveMode
Represents the sport drive mode, possible only when moving under the speed of 200 Km/h and there is exactly one passenger.
See Also:
DriveMode

  • Constructor Details

    • SportMode

  • Method Details

    • accelerate

      public void accelerate​(double acceleration, double amount)
      Description copied from class: DriveMode
      Accelerates the car consuming fuel and/or battery depending on the drive mode. If the car runs out of fuel, it turns the engine off.
      Specified by:
      accelerate in class DriveMode
      Parameters:
      acceleration - the acceleration.
      amount - a factor between 0.0 and 1.0

    • isLegal

      public boolean isLegal()
      Specified by:
      isLegal in class DriveMode
      Returns:
      If the current drive mode is legal or not for the current car state (for example SportMode is illegal when there are more than one passenger).
